tasks.label: Create symbolic link
tasks.command: $config = Get-Content -Raw -Path '${workspaceFolder}\project-config.json' | ConvertFrom-Json; $target = $config.symbolicLink.targetFolder; $source = Join-Path '${workspaceFolder}' $config.symbolicLink.sourceFolder; $targetParent = Split-Path $target -Parent; if (-not (Test-Path $targetParent)) { Write-Host "Creating parent directory: $targetParent"; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $targetParent -Force | Out-Null }; if (Test-Path $target) { Write-Host 'Removing existing link...'; cmd /c rmdir $target }; Write-Host "Creating symbolic link from $target to $source"; cmd /c mklink /J "$target" "$source"
